sentences.english: All crew members assembled on boat deck and exercised abandon ship drill.
sentences.chinese: 全體船員在艇甲板上集合，進行棄船演習。

sentences.english: The captain dived his submarine deep to escape from the destroyers.
sentences.chinese: 海軍上校使他的潛艇深深下潛以逃避驅逐艇。

sentences.english: Seakeeping capability of conventional planing hull is poor.
sentences.chinese: 常規滑行艇的耐波性能很差。

sentences.english: The boat won by three lengths.
sentences.chinese: 這隻艇以3艇長之差得勝。

sentences.english: Lower No. 1 lifeboat alongside embarkation deck and report.
sentences.chinese: 放下一號艇到登艇甲板並報告。

sentences.english: The boats with engines are air charging ones made of glass fiber reinforced plastics, equipped with double horsepower engines and a framework as well.
sentences.chinese: 動力艇爲玻璃鋼充氣艇，配備雙馬力引擎，附有船架。

sentences.english: Here is the SMS Vulkan, sub tender for the North Sea U-boat fleet.
sentences.chinese: 這是一艘“維路卡”號補給艦，爲北海U艇部隊所有。

sentences.english: Transport may only be chosen as a casualty if there are no other eligible units.
sentences.chinese: 在沒有其他合法目標的時候，運輸艇纔可以承受戰損。

sentences.english: It’s easy to hydroplane to the island.
sentences.chinese: 坐滑行艇到島上十分便利。

sentences.english: And try another commo call to the shuttle while you're at it.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏再試着呼叫一次穿梭艇。

sentences.english: Launching tracks of No. 1 lifeboat clear in 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 一號艇放艇滑軌在10分鐘內暢通。
救助艇的最大工作負荷是非曲直14KN。

sentences.english: Keep two mooring boats on your port deck.
sentences.chinese: 兩隻帶纜艇吊放左舷甲板。

sentences.english: Rem cut the shuttle in the direction of the concentration camp as Lron had spotted it on the map.
sentences.chinese: 雷將穿梭艇轉向勒榮在地圖上標出的集中營的方向。

sentences.english: The U-boat captains could hardly believe their good fortune.
sentences.chinese: 艇艦長們簡直不敢相信他們的好運氣。

sentences.english: Immensely tall she looked to me from my low station in the coracle.
sentences.chinese: 我從小艇上仰看大船，它顯得異常高大。
